org.drools.rule.builder
Interface RuleConditionBuilder

All Known Subinterfaces:
AccumulateBuilder, FromBuilder
All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectBuilder, ForallBuilder, GroupElementBuilder, JavaAccumulateBuilder, JavaEvalBuilder, MVELAccumulateBuilder, MVELEvalBuilder, MVELFromBuilder, PatternBuilder
public interface RuleConditionBuilder

An interface to define classes capable of building specific conditional elements.
